More on XDC (XinFin Network)

XinFin Network, developed by XinFin, is a hybrid blockchain designed to address limitations in existing Layer 1 chains and promote broader blockchain adoption. Utilizing hybrid blockchain technology, it focuses on decentralization, security, and scalability. The native token, XDC, plays a crucial role in network security, validator rewards, transaction facilitation, and value transfer. Additionally, XDC empowers its holders with governance capabilities, allowing them to participate in decision-making for protocol upgrades and network enhancements.
